title: Hope
lyrics:
I would have walked through fire to kiss your lips
Do you still think about it, of what you did?
Still see your old apartment, like a bad trip
Wish I could forget all the places we've been
Hot and heavy with your goodbyes

Boy, you know how to make a girl cry

We're sleeping in a bed full of lies

And now than I'm older, I can see why



You make me feel high

'Cause you had me so low, low, low

You only seem tall

'Cause you stumped my growth, growth, growth

I only wanted you 'cause I couldn't have you

Now that I know

That wasn't love , that wasn't love, that was just hope



That wasn't love, that wasn't love, that was just hope



Always another bender, I lose control

I thought I'd get it back when

You came back home to me, darling

But I never had it, did I? Your heart's a trip

And all the magic we felt, was just a hit



Hot and heavy with your goodbyes

Boy, you know how to make a girl cry

We're sleeping in a bed full of lies

And now than I'm older, I can see why



You make me feel high

'Cause you had me so low, low, low

You only seem tall

'Cause you stumped my growth, growth, growth

I only wanted you 'cause I couldn't have you

Now that I know (Now that I know)

That wasn't love, that wasn't love, that was just hope



That wasn't love, that wasn't lov, that was just hope



You make me feel high

'Cause you had me so low, low, low

You only seem tall

'Cause you stumped my growth, growth, growth

I only wanted you 'cause I couldn't have you

Now that I know (Now that I know)

That wasn't love, that wasn't love, that was just hope
